description: Officer Jenny`s Herdier goes on patrol with the Hiun City Officer Jenny (Isshu). It rides in her motorcycle side car and jumps into action when needed. As a police dog, it`s been trained to obey orders and to be able to adapted to various situations which can often be dangerous. Officer Jenny`s Herdier`s helped guard the Fushide in the Central Plaza so they wouldn`t return to the other parts of Hiun City on the day the Fushide invaded the city.
name: Herderrier (Junsaa)
